channel.title: How can i make global objects on my pimpscape server?
channel.description:
Hey, i was wondering if any1 had a script for my client.jave to put in global objects.
this is what i wanted to add that worked on a perfectscape server:
makeGlobalObject(2762,2767,9299,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south makeGlobalObject(2763,2767,9299,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south makeGlobalObject(2766,2767,9299,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south makeGlobalObject(2767,2767,9299,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south makeGlobalObject(2767,2767,9299,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2768,2767,9299,4,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2767,2769,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2767,2770,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2767,2771,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2767,2772,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2767,2768,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2761,2767,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2761,2768,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2761,2769,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2761,2770,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2761,2771,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2761,2772,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east makeGlobalObject(2762,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls South makeGlobalObject(2763,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls South makeGlobalObject(2764,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls South makeGlobalObject(2765,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls South makeGlobalObject(2766,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south makeGlobalObject(2767,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south but how can i make a script to make it work on my pimpscape?
btw i cant find an accurate script from the server it worked on.

item.title: How can i make global objects on my pimpscape server?
item.dc:creator: @_0mfg0rz ~0mfg0rz~
item.description:
@_0mfg0rz wrote:

[quote=“Pancakes, post:1, topic:91558”]Hey, i was wondering if any1 had a script for my client.jave to put in global objects.

this is what i wanted to add that worked on a perfectscape server:

	makeGlobalObject(2762,2767,9299,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south
	makeGlobalObject(2763,2767,9299,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south
	makeGlobalObject(2766,2767,9299,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south
	makeGlobalObject(2767,2767,9299,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south
	makeGlobalObject(2767,2767,9299,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2768,2767,9299,4,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2767,2769,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2767,2770,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2767,2771,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2767,2772,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2767,2768,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2761,2767,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2761,2768,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2761,2769,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2761,2770,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2761,2771,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2761,2772,9299,2,0); //::PKBOX Walls east
	makeGlobalObject(2762,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls South
	makeGlobalObject(2763,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls South
	makeGlobalObject(2764,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls South
	makeGlobalObject(2765,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls South
	makeGlobalObject(2766,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south
	makeGlobalObject(2767,2773,2854,3,0); //::PKBOX Walls south

but how can i make a script to make it work on my pimpscape?

btw i cant find an accurate script from the server it worked on.[/quote] try using in code layout and try the Tut section
